name: Project Planning Kit (Gantt)
description:
The Team Planner (Gantt) was designed to help you organize the team projects in speed up work environments to improve your visibility with stakeholders.


Build with (auto-layout)to simplify your planning time; a quarter board example is included to help you.


In this Figma file you can:


  • Planning your team quarters by sprints.
  • Assign a team member.
  • Choose different colors for projects.
  • Enter a deadline date or alert note.


Let me know your feedback or ideas for improving the file.

Thanks.
